<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This is an alternative analysis pass to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// BlockFrequencyInfoWrapperPass.  The difference is that with this pass the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// block frequencies are not computed when the analysis pass is executed but</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// rather when the BFI result is explicitly requested by the analysis client.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// There are some additional requirements for any client pass that wants to use</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the analysis:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 1 The pass needs to initialize dependent passes with:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   INITIALIZE&#95;PASS&#95;DEPENDENCY(LazyBFIPass)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 2 Similarly, getAnalysisUsage should call:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   LazyBlockFrequencyInfoPass::getLazyBFIAnalysisUsage(AU)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 3 The computed BFI should be requested with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    getAnalysis&lt;LazyBlockFrequencyInfoPass&gt;().getBFI() before either LoopInfo</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    or BPI could be invalidated for example by changing the CFG.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Note that it is expected that we wouldn&#39;t need this functionality for the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// new PM since with the new PM, analyses are executed on demand.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Helper for client passes to set up the analysis usage on behalf of this</span></CodeLine>
